name: New
info:
New registration. You still have to send your interest to the event. 
 You can still make changes after you have submitted until the event confirms your attendance.

name: Submitted
info:
The event knows you want to come and has your numbers. 
 You can still make changes until your application is confirmed. 
 You will get a confirmation once your attendance has been accepted.

name: Confirmed
info: Your space has been allocated with the information you provided.

name: Closed
info: The event has passed. We hope you had a good time.
